column5: I just noticed these great deals in the BARGAIN CAVE at Cabelas.Com .Might be worth a look if someone is looking to purchase for the upcoming season.

Cabelas seems to have some excellent deals on electronics !!  I recentely purchased a Lowrance unit from them and the TOTAL price, delivered to my home, including EVERYTHING, was $608 CDN  The exact same unit at BPS in Toronto is $1017, before taxes  I saved over $500 and it only took a couple days to get here.
